meanings.definition: A compound that is found in muscle cells and is used to store and supply energy for muscle contraction.
meanings.sent1: Creatine helps muscles have energy for moving.
meanings.sent2: Athletes sometimes take creatine to boost their performance.
meanings.sent3: The creatine in muscles is like a little battery pack.
meanings.sent4: Creatine is the fuel that powers muscle movements.
meanings.sent5: Imagine creatine as tiny energy packets inside muscles.

meanings.definition: A substance that is often used as a dietary supplement to improve athletic performance.
meanings.sent1: Taking creatine can help athletes get stronger.
meanings.sent2: Many athletes believe in the benefits of using creatine.
meanings.sent3: Creatine is like a secret weapon for some sports players.
meanings.sent4: In the world of sports, creatine is a game-changer.
meanings.sent5: Athletes swear by the effects of creatine on their performance.
